name: Guide
text: In this two-playered game, you'll be controlling Sullivan (father) and Stephanie (mother).

name: Guide
text: You'll be tasked to obtain all of the needed items for your son's upcoming party.

name: Guide
text: In order to obtain these items, you'll have to complete 6 minigames.

name: Guide
text: Around the neighborhood, we've hidden portals to each of the minigames.

name: Guide
text: **Hint**Hint** Follow the paths to find the minigames.

name: Guide
text: Good Luck, and remember to have fun!
